nodes.text:
Outpost Largona, also known as Largona Outpost, was a settlement on the planet Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Largona
was situated in the Jundland Wastes region, just north of the canyon known as The Wound. It featured a full medical center, run by the Bith Doctor Aidarro, and an Anchorhead militia garrison. Notable inhabitants were the militia officer Jule, Professor Larcoh, Fez Burba, Dester, and Bleb-Blek.

Outpost Largona was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Republic settlements on the planet Tatooine.
